articles.author: David Bressan
articles.title: Oldest Fossils Of Modern Humans Dated To More Than 230,000 Years Ago - Forbes
articles.description: The age of the oldest fossils in eastern Africa widely recognized as representing our species, Homo sapiens, has long been uncertain. Now, dating of a massive volcanic eruption in Ethiopia reveals they are much older than previously thought.
articles.content:
Side view of ancient human skull.
getty
The Omo remains are a collection of fossil bones discovered between 1967 and 1974 at the Omo Kibish sites near the Omo River, in Omo National Park in south-w… [+5455 chars]

articles.author: Morgan McFall-Johnsen
articles.title: Oldest human fossils in East Africa are even older than we thought - Business Insider
articles.description: The bones of ancient Homo sapiens, unearthed in Ethiopia, were buried beneath a layer of volcanic ash. A new clue helped scientists date the fossils.
articles.content:
Eastern Africa's oldest human fossils are even more ancient than researchers thought, a new study suggests.
The Omo I fossils are a set of Homo sapiens bones unearthed in the late 1960s, deep in Eth… [+3359 chars]

articles.title: New study suggests oldest modern human fossils could be 40,000 years older: Report - Republic World
articles.description: The timeline for the earliest human fossils - discovered in East Africa - have been pushed back by about 40,000 years, according to newly published research.
articles.content: The timeline for the earliest human fossils - discovered in East Africa - have been pushed back by about 40,000 years, according to new research released in the scientific journal, Nature. The oldest… [+2042 chars]
